title: Bottega Veneta Mini Loop Camera Bag
description: Bottega Veneta mini loop camera bag in Intrecciato white Nappa lambskin leather. Featuring gold-tone hardware and a crossbody leather shoulder strap. The top zipper opens to a matching white leather interior. Approximate dimensions: 18cm(L) x 10cm(H) x 4.5m(D), 63cm leather strap drop, adjustable. With Entrupy Certificate of Authenticity. (Pre-owned)
